body_html:
You could try this converter I wrote... https://github.com/aselle/tensorflow/blob/7e71aa528111cd73cabc9fefdbb68422e35c16ce/tensorflow/examples/speech_commands/conv_only.py

the main problem is you are using two early of an op in the graph, because you are expected to decode your own wave into a pcm array first (unlike the tf graph).

body:
You could try this converter I wrote... https://github.com/aselle/tensorflow/blob/7e71aa528111cd73cabc9fefdbb68422e35c16ce/tensorflow/examples/speech_commands/conv_only.py

the main problem is you are using two early of an op in the graph, because you are expected to decode your own wave into a pcm array first (unlike the tf graph).
